text: wada't al'ard yawm alqiamat 'iidha tjla alhaqu jl wela llkhlayq lifasl alqda', wanasharat almalayikat sahifat kl frd, waji' bialnabiiyn walshhwd ealaa alamm; liyas'al allah alnabiiyn ean altabligh waeamma ajabthm bih ammhm, kama tati 'umat muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm; ltshhd btblygh alrusul alssabiqin lammhm 'iidha ankrt hdha altblygh, ftqwm alhujat ealaa alamm, waqadaa rbb alealamin bayn aleibad bialeadl altam, wahum la yuzlmwn shyyana bnqs thawab 'aw ziadat eqab
